Comments
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
I don't know. It's nice that the first Michael B. Jordan-style Killmonger in Clix is going to be widely available, but he's got at least a ten-point cost penalty just for "being a Common" (compare Uncommon Post-Apocalyptic Black Widow). He's not bad, and if he's your only Outwit and/or EE in Sealed, you probably need to play him. He keeps an 11 attack on clicks two and three; lots of this set can't say that... I guess I wish he had those 11s on his back dial, when he needs to engage to stay alive, instead of his front dial, when attacks are gravy to his Outwit? I guess he's suffering from the Commons in this set being often spectacular, where he's merely quite good.
May 2, 2022
Goop
Stealth + Outwit + EE is a great combo when used together. I actually like him for only 60pts. Kinda top heavy though, the last few clicks aren't that impressive.
